alert.note: Alert for Blanco; Comal; Kendall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 6:18PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Blanco, southeastern Kendall and Comal Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 618 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Garden Ridge, or 8 miles west of New Braunfels, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Braunfels, Schertz, Canyon Lake, Bulverde, Garden Ridge, Guadalupe River State Park, Smithson Valley, Spring Branch, Twin Sisters, Bergheim, Kendalia, Anhalt, Startzville, Solms, Gruene, and Honey Creek State Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
